mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANYMERCY.POSTING ( CAT_NO, MEM_NO, POST_CNT, POST_DATE, POST_LATITUDE, POST_LONGITUDE, POST_NO, POST_PHOTO1, POST_PHOTO2, POST_PHOTO3, POST_PHOTO4, POST_PHOTO5, POST_TITLE, POST_TYPE) VALUES ( #{cat_no }, #{ mem_no }, #{ post_cnt }, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{ post_latitude }, #{ post_longitude }, seq_post_no.nextval, #{ post_photo1 }, #{ post_photo2 }, #{ post_photo3 }, #{ post_photo4 }, #{ post_photo5 }, #{ post_title }, #{ post_type } )
mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_NO, P.MEM_NO, MCF.FOLLOWER_COUNT, MCF.CAT_NO, P.POST_DATE, p.post_photo1, C.CAT_NAME, C.CAT_LOCAL, C.CAT_PHOTO FROM ANYMERCY.POSTING P , (SELECT COUNT(CAT_NO) AS FOLLOWER_COUNT, CAT_NO FROM ANYMERCY.MEMBER_CAT_FOLLOW GROUP BY CAT_NO ) MCF ,(SELECT CAT_NAME, CAT_LOCAL, CAT_NO, CAT_PHOTO FROM ANYMERCY.CAT) C WHERE P.CAT_NO = MCF.CAT_NO AND P.CAT_NO = C.CAT_NO ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC, MCF.FOLLOWER_COUNT DESC

SELECT p.post_no, p.cat_no, p.mem_no, p.post_photo1, C.CAT_NAME, C.CAT_LOCAL, C.CAT_PHOTO FROM POSTING p , (SELECT distinct mcf.cat_no FROM MEMBER_CAT_FOLLOW mcf, MEMBER m WHERE mcf.mem_no = #{mem_no}) memcat ,(SELECT CAT_NAME, CAT_LOCAL, CAT_NO, CAT_PHOTO FROM ANYMERCY.CAT) C WHERE p.cat_no = memcat.cat_no AND P.CAT_NO = C.CAT_NO

SELECT C.POST_NO, C.CMT_NO, C.CMT_CNT, C.CMT_DATE, C.CMT_MEM_NO, M.MEM_ID AS CMT_MEM_ID, M.MEM_PHOTO FROM CMT C, (SELECT MEM_ID, NVL(MEM_PHOTO, '../pds/dft.jpg')MEM_PHOTO, MEM_NO FROM MEMBER) M WHERE C.POST_NO = #{post_no} AND C.CMT_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO ORDER BY C.CMT_DATE asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMT (CMT_NO ,POST_NO, CMT_CNT, CMT_DATE,CMT_MEM_NO) VALUES (seq_cmt_no.nextval,#{post_no},#{cmt_cnt},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'),#{mem_no})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM POST_LIKE WHERE POST_NO = #{post_no} AND MEM_NO = #{mem_no}
